title: Student ID Card
description: A student ID card contains information about a student's personal information and studies. It is issued by a university to its students.

fullName.description: The full name of the student.

photoURI.description: A URI that points to a picture of the student.

universityName.description: The official name of the university.

degreeTitle.description: The title of the degree the student is pursuing.

fieldOfStudy.description: The name of the program the student is enrolled in.

enrollmentDate.description: The date the student first enrolled in the program.

currentSemester.description: The current semester the student is enrolled in.
